"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55075c8f6368721fc3042700#post_55075c8f6368721fc3042700
No. Currently focused on getting through woodfall temple.

Also, I have no idea why I keep seeing afterimages in certain conditions. Is it just me? (I have always been cross eyed, And I never wore glasses, But I thought I got rid of that through pure concentration.)
